sense.name: 家, family
sense.commentary: A social group of parents, children, and other relatives.
sense.examples:
家事 family matters
良家姑娘 a young girl of good family.
你家有几口人? How many persons are there in your family?

sense.name: 家, home, place
sense.commentary: A structure in which a person lives, esp. a house or apartment.
sense.examples:
回家 go home.
上我家去. Come to my place.
我把这当作我的家. I look upon this as my home.

sense.name: 家, a person or family engaged in a certain trade
sense.commentary: a person or family engaged in a certain trade, such as peasant (farm) family, etc.
sense.examples:
船家 boatman
农家 peasant(farm) family
渔家 fisherman's family

sense.name: 家, a specialist in a certain field
sense.commentary: a specialist in a certain field such as scientist, painter, etc.
sense.examples:
画家 painter
科学家 scientist
文学家 a man of letters (writer)

sense.name: 家, my
sense.commentary: my here means in Chinese members of the family, such as my father, my wife, etc.
sense.examples:
家父 my father
家人 my wife
家兄 my elder brother

sense.name: 家, domestic, tame
sense.commentary: domestic animals are usually called 家兔 rabbit, or 家狗 dog, etc.
sense.examples:
家兔 rabbit
家畜 domestic animal (pets)
家狗 dog

sense.name: 家, internal
sense.commentary: internal means within a family, such as 家仇 internal hate, or 家贼 pilferer working from within, etc.
sense.examples:
家贼 pilferer working from within
家仇 internal hate
家斗 internal fight
